context.name: Swarovski Z8i 2.3-18x56 P ILL 4A-300-I Rifle Scope
context.excerpt: The Swarovski Z8i 2.3-18×56 P ILL 4A-300-I rifle scope is a high-luminosity scope that can deliver the crucial details even in poor light conditions.
context.content:
The Swarovski Z8i 2.3-18x56 P ILL 4A-300-I rifle scope is a high-luminosity scope that can deliver the crucial details even in poor light conditions.

This rifle scope has excellent optics that deliver razor-sharp images even in challenging situations. The high magnification and detail provides impressive precision over long distances.

 

Swarovski Optik Z8i 2.3-18x56 P ILL 4A-300-I Rifle Scope Technical Data:

Magnification 2.3-18
Effective objective lens diameter (mm) 18.4-56
Exit pupil diameter (mm) 8.1-3.1
Exit pupil distance (mm) (Eye relief) 95
Field of view (ft/100 yds / m/100 m) 55.8-6.9 / 18.6-2.3
Field of view (degrees) 10.6-1.3
Field of view, apparent (degrees) 24
Dioptric compensation (dpt) -3 to +2
Light transmission (%) 93
Twilight factor acc. to ISO 14132-1 6.5-31.8
Impact point corr. per click (in/100 yds / mm/100 m) 0.36 / 10
Max. elevation / windage adjustment range (in/100 yds / m/100 m) 64.8/36.0 / 1.8/1.0
Parallax correction (yds / m) 55-∞ / 50-∞
Objective filter thread M 58x0.75
